item.title: Is this correct?
item.dc:creator: @Schedin Schedin
item.description:
@Schedin wrote:

Due to problems with my java (screwd up comp) I cant seem to run my server. But i would like to know if these commands work. Does the code look like it would work?

PS iv never coded commands before…

[code]{
if (command.startsWith(“gm1”) && playerRights >=1)
{
